display_information.name: GitHub Threads
display_information.description: A Slack slash command integration that posts Slack thread conversations as comments to GitHub issues.
display_information.long_description: This app provides a bridge between Slack and GitHub, allowing you to easily share Slack thread discussions as comments on GitHub issues. When you use the slash command with a GitHub issue URL, it will collect all messages in the current thread and post them as a formatted comment to the specified GitHub issue.
